languages.text: {n}Вы замечаете, что челюсть кибермастифа скошена набок: кто-то из бандитов успел нанести зверю удар. Когда вы пытаетесь дотронуться до нее, Глейто отворачивается и угрожающе рычит.{/n}
{n}You notice that the cyber-mastiff's jaw is slightly crooked — one of the bandits must have managed to get in a solid blow. When you try to touch it, Glaito turns away and growls menacingly.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы замечаете, что челюсть кибермастифа скошена набок: кто-то из бандитов успел нанести зверю удар. Когда вы пытаетесь дотронуться до нее, Глейто отворачивается и угрожающе рычит.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice that the cyber-mastiff's jaw is slightly crooked — one of the bandits must have managed to get in a solid blow. When you try to touch it, Glaito turns away and growls menacingly.{/n}

{n}You notice that the cyber-mastiff's jaw is slightly crooked — one of the bandits must have managed to get in a solid blow. When you try to touch it, Glaito turns away and growls menacingly.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你注意到格雷托的下巴有些歪曲，肯定是某个土匪狠狠地击中了它。你试图触碰它，可格雷托却转过了身，发出了充满威胁意味的咆哮。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice that the cyber-mastiff's jaw is slightly crooked — one of the bandits must have managed to get in a solid blow. When you try to touch it, Glaito turns away and growls menacingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到格雷托的下巴有些歪曲，肯定是某个土匪狠狠地击中了它。你试图触碰它，可格雷托却转过了身，发出了充满威胁意味的咆哮。{/n}

languages.text: {n}サイバーマスチフの顎がわずかに歪んでいることに気づいた。どうやら、盗賊の一人がうまく一撃を食らわせたらしい。触れようとすると、グライトは顔を背け、威嚇するように低く唸った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice that the cyber-mastiff's jaw is slightly crooked — one of the bandits must have managed to get in a solid blow. When you try to touch it, Glaito turns away and growls menacingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サイバーマスチフの顎がわずかに歪んでいることに気づいた。どうやら、盗賊の一人がうまく一撃を食らわせたらしい。触れようとすると、グライトは顔を背け、威嚇するように低く唸った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te das cuenta de que el cibermastín tiene la mandíbula ligeramente desencajada; alguno de los bandidos le habrá golpeado de lleno. Cuando intentas tocarla, Glaito se aparta y gruñe amenazadoramente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice that the cyber-mastiff's jaw is slightly crooked — one of the bandits must have managed to get in a solid blow. When you try to touch it, Glaito turns away and growls menacingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te das cuenta de que el cibermastín tiene la mandíbula ligeramente desencajada; alguno de los bandidos le habrá golpeado de lleno. Cuando intentas tocarla, Glaito se aparta y gruñe amenazadoramente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Siber mastifin çenesinin hafif yamulmuş olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Haydutlardan biri, sert bir darbe indirmeyi başarmış olmalı. Ona dokunmaya çalıştığında Glaito, başını çevirip tehditkâr bir şekilde hırlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice that the cyber-mastiff's jaw is slightly crooked — one of the bandits must have managed to get in a solid blow. When you try to touch it, Glaito turns away and growls menacingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Siber mastifin çenesinin hafif yamulmuş olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Haydutlardan biri, sert bir darbe indirmeyi başarmış olmalı. Ona dokunmaya çalıştığında Glaito, başını çevirip tehditkâr bir şekilde hırlıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous remarquez que la mâchoire du cyber-mastiff est légèrement tordue. L'un des bandits a dû réussir à lui placer un coup puissant. Lorsque vous tentez de la toucher, Glaito détourne la tête et grogne d'un air menaçant,{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice that the cyber-mastiff's jaw is slightly crooked — one of the bandits must have managed to get in a solid blow. When you try to touch it, Glaito turns away and growls menacingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous remarquez que la mâchoire du cyber-mastiff est légèrement tordue. L'un des bandits a dû réussir à lui placer un coup puissant. Lorsque vous tentez de la toucher, Glaito détourne la tête et grogne d'un air menaçant,{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dir fällt auf, dass der Kiefer des Cyber-Mastiffs leicht verbogen ist ... einer der Banditen muss ihm einen ordentlichen Schlag versetzt haben. Als du versuchst, die Stelle zu berührend, wendet sich Glaito mit einem drohenden Knurren ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice that the cyber-mastiff's jaw is slightly crooked — one of the bandits must have managed to get in a solid blow. When you try to touch it, Glaito turns away and growls menacingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dir fällt auf, dass der Kiefer des Cyber-Mastiffs leicht verbogen ist ... einer der Banditen muss ihm einen ordentlichen Schlag versetzt haben. Als du versuchst, die Stelle zu berührend, wendet sich Glaito mit einem drohenden Knurren ab."
